类 NutritionService

java.lang.Object
service.NutritionService
public class NutritionService extends Object
Service class for handling nutrition-related calculations and data management. This class provides functionality for retrieving nutritional information about ingredients and calculating nutritional values based on quantities and units.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

      public NutritionService()

  • 方法详细资料

    • getNutritionData

      public static NutritionService.NutritionData getNutritionData(String ingredientName)
      Retrieves nutritional data for a specific ingredient. Performs case-insensitive matching and partial name matching.
      参数:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient to look up
      返回:
      NutritionData object containing nutritional information, or null if not found

    • calculateNutritionForQuantity

      public static NutritionService.NutritionData calculateNutritionForQuantity(String ingredientName, Float quantity, String unit)
      Calculates nutritional values for a specific quantity and unit of an ingredient. The base nutritional data is per 100 grams, and this method scales it appropriately.
      参数:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient
      quantity - the quantity of the ingredient
      unit - the unit of measurement (g, kg, oz, lb, etc.)
      返回:
      NutritionData object with calculated values, or null if calculation fails

    • hasNutritionData

      public static boolean hasNutritionData(String ingredientName)
      Checks if nutritional data is available for a specific ingredient.
      参数:
      ingredientName - the name of the ingredient to check
      返回:
      true if nutritional data exists, false otherwise
